title: Retro Future: Modern Arcade Pack
description: Retro Future: Modern Arcade is a collection of 10 high-quality, seamlessly-looping tracks and 50+ SFX/musical cues, full of high-energy modern excitement mixed with classic 8-bit video game charm.
longDescription:
These tracks are an ideal complement to platformers, racing games, or anything in a digital or arcade-oriented style. With elements of rock, jazz, and EDM, this collection creates a special musical blend that will make any game stand out from the rest. Enter the metaverse, party at a night-club on the moon, or blast off to another galaxyâ€” Retro Future: Modern Arcade will take you there.



Demo Reel: https://on.soundcloud.com/goUfD

technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 44.1 khz
  • 16 bit
  • .wav format
  • stereo
  • 10 music tracks, 53 SFX & musical cues
  • tracks with separate versions for starting, looping, and ending


Number of Audio Wavs: 90

Number of Audio Cues: 90

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 khz / 16 bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 25
